description: Get ready as the 84th edition of REBECA is right around the corner. BEings, Pujo asche!
name: Rebeca: 84th edition

shortcuts.name: Events and Schedule
shortcuts.description: Explore our comprehensive event schedule and get detailed information about all upcoming events, timings, and venues.

shortcuts.name: Sponsorship
shortcuts.description: Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of IIEST Shibpur as we showcase our traditions, talents, and iconic celebrations, inviting potential sponsors to join us on this extraordinary journey.

shortcuts.name: Our Team
shortcuts.description: Meet the passionate members of the Rebeca team, each dedicated to orchestrating the 84th edition of Rebeca with unwavering commitment and creativity.

shortcuts.name: Merchandise
shortcuts.description: Delve into the exclusive world of Rebeca's official merchandise, featuring the iconic T-shirt design of the 84th edition.
